name: Pika Protocol
description: PIKA is the first launchpad on Bitlayer, it is a multi-chain platform supporting ETH, BSC, TON, Base, SOL, etc., and offering Primary Automated Market Maker (PAMM). It‘s primary aim is to bridge the gap between developers and communities within the blockchain space. 🔥Innovative Features PIKA pioneered the LaunchPad+++, and developed these unique features: 📍+FairLaunch: Fair and transparent launch mechanism 📍+Presale Launch: Provide users with early participation opportunities at a discount before early projects are listed on CEX 📍+Primary Automated Market Maker (PAMM) : PAMM improves the liquidity and transaction efficiency of issuing tokens. ⛽️PIKA Framework: PIKA is are committed to developing open-source tools for developers and users, facilitating transparent funding, operation, and scaling of projects and communities on BitLayer.
